bio: A Yo-kai whose only cause is rebellion, he Inspirits good kids into badness and delinquency.

soultimate.name: Stare Down
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drop foe's movement speed by 50% and Move Meter speed by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to decrease foes' speed for a time.

skill.effect: Increases damage to foes in danger.
